text:
Hey everyone! At Zengrowth, we're organizing a webinar that covers the most intriguing content marketing and storytelling examples - all the way from the 1895 until the modern times. There are actionable lessons included from each case study.

Here's just a small fragment of the reason why you should register:

:point_right: Discover how Jell-O set the foundation for modern content marketing practices in the food industry

:point_right: See how Nike (un)intentionally contributed to the jogging craze in the sixties and seventies in the US

:point_right: Find out how IKEA made an unrivaled community with its catalog that's officially the most printed resource in history (yep, it surpassed even the Bible and the Quran)

:point_right: Enjoy an overview and analysis of the brilliant content strategies by Gong and Drift (what can I say, I simply love these folks and had to include them as well :revolving_hearts:)

:point_right: Get a free ebook afterwards

Register here: <https://app.livestorm.co/zengrowth-1/the-best-companies-are-storytellers-heres-what-you-can-learn?type=detailed>

attachments.title: The best companies are storytellers - here's what you can learn | Zengrowth
attachments.text: Most of us associate content marketing with the digital world, but its roots go much deeper.Join this webinar to discover brilliant examples of storytelling and content marketing - from John Deere’...
attachments.fallback: Zengrowth: The best companies are storytellers - here's what you can learn | Zengrowth

text: A new article I just wrote about my mindset shift in B2B marketing <https://www.thejuicehq.com/blog/the-evolution-from-me-centered-marketing-to-modern-day-marketing>

attachments.title: The evolution from "me" centered marketing to Modern Day Marketing  | The Juice
attachments.text: In this article Brett McGrath, VP of Marketing at The Juice shares his perspective on his road to recovery from being a "me" centered marketer to becoming a Modern Day Marketer. This post provides context on the differences in these two different types of B2B marketers.
